column2: This bishop is probably next in line for a Cardinalship when one becomes available.
Of all the bishops in my realm, this one is the likeliest to get appointed Cardinal by the Archbishop.
The Preferatus is the Cardinal expected to succeed the current Archbishop.
Innovation is respected by the clergy and thinkers of your religion. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
Ashé, or "Soul", is respected by the priests. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
Tradition is respected by the clergy and especially the head of your Religion. It can be spent to petition the head of your Religion. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.

Roentgens are respected by the clergy and especially the head of your Religion. It can be spent to petition the head of your Religion. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
Purity is respected by the clergy and shamans of your religion. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
Aptitude is respected by the clergy of your religion. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
Drive is respected by the clergy of your religion. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
